TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: the sale of Minecraft to mojang is a good thing

Naruto ripped off Kill Bill

I didn't buy Just Cause just cause i didn't want to.

The game is called Laugh out Loud but it isn't really funny....

I tried searching for LetGo bricks but I couldn't find any!

I watched all 1000 episodes of Beach but we never got a single beach episode

Edited September 16, 2014 by SpaceXray
Batman is a better detective than Sherlock and Sherlock's hat is stupid.
FAR is stupid, it always makes my planes fall apart.
Live long and may the force be with you.

"All the kids in Homestuck are CLEARLY white because they're drawn that way!"

"Aww, Rose and Kanaya are such great friends!"

Okay, fine, enough Homestuck...

"Oh, you like [game, TV show, or movie]? Can I show you my fanfiction?"

"I don't like Scratch because I prefer REAL programming!"

"Spore is okay, but it's only good once you get to the space stage."

Wesley Crusher rocks!

EA just bought your favorite game!

Ancient weapons and hokey religions are no match for a good blaster at your side

Larry Niven is a talentless hack with no originality
You re dumb and you should feel bad
"Realistic KSP is no fun because it's boring."

everything except twilight, is a better love story than twilight. In fact, my relationship with 2 watermelons this summer is still a better love story than twilight, even after I cut them up and ate them.

"Realistic KSP is no fun because it's boring."

Don't let regex see that.
Or else what ?!? The K.I.B, Kerbal In Black factory Will Smith the futur. Hum, ... nevermind ;op

E.A. needs to buy KSP & Minecraft! This would do wonders!

Spaceplanes ruined KSP.

Not bad.

Not bad.

microsfot has minecraft. that's a good thing! (note: that is my entry)

Greedo shot first.

Highlander 2 was the best Highlander movie.

i hate marvel, i hate guardians of the galaxy and i loved The last airbender movie

(oh god i went too far....)
Aeris deserved to die.

Aeris deserved to die.

You are a bad, bad person.

Anime is bad for health!

DO A BARREL ROLL!
I had so much trouble with the Hydra, I never heard Phil telling me to get up on its back.

I hate the concept of Force in Star Wars and the unrealistic laserz.

EA Games just bought KSP as well for (only) 750 million dollars ! Their first addition to the game is the brand new first person view, as the new team (since Squad got fired) are planning to add new weapons.

Oh and modding is now illegal.
